data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lenhart, Paul A., Dash, Shawn T., Mackay, William P. (2013): A revision of the giant Amazonian ants of the genus Dinoponera (Hymenoptera, Formicidae). Journal of Hymenoptera Research 31: 119-164, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.31.4335, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.31.4335
